00027 #ifndef __FONT_MANAGER_H__
00028 #define __FONT_MANAGER_H__
00029 
00030 #include "osystem.h"
00031 
00032 #include "FTGL/ftgl.h"
00033 
00034 namespace omega
00035 {
00037         class Font
00038         {
00039         public:
00040                 enum Align {HALeft = 1 << 0, HARight = 1 << 1, HACenter = 1 << 2,
00041                                         VATop = 1 << 3, VABottom = 1 << 4, VAMiddle = 1 << 5};
00042         public:
00043                 Font(FTFont* fontImpl): myFontImpl(fontImpl) {}
00044 
00045                 OUTILS_API void render(const String& text, float x, float y);
00046                 OUTILS_API Vector2f computeSize(const omega::String& text);
00047 
00048         private:
00049                 FTFont* myFontImpl;
00050         };
00051 
00053         typedef Dictionary<String, Font*> FontDictionary;
00054 
00056         class FontManager
00057         {
00058         public:
00059                 OUTILS_API FontManager();
00060                 OUTILS_API ~FontManager();
00061 
00062                 OUTILS_API void cleanup();
00063 
00064                 OUTILS_API void createFont(omega::String fontName, omega::String filename, int size);
00065                 OUTILS_API Font* getFont(omega::String fontName);
00066 
00067         private:
00068                 FontDictionary myFonts;
00069         };
00070 }; // namespace omega
